pages.title: Lion
pages.text: The lion is a large cat of the genus Panthera native to Africa and India. It has a muscular, broad-chested body, short, rounded head, round ears, and a hairy tuft at the end of its tail. $(br2)It is sexually dimorphic; adult male lions are larger than females and have a prominent mane.

pages.title: Lion
pages.text: Relative Size: ★★★☆☆$(br2)Active during Daytime$(br2)2 Colors$(br2)Favourite Food: minecraft:beef$(br2)Number of Offspring: 2$(br2)Growth time: 6 Days
